title: Manage a Union Grievance
description: A union representative has filed a grievance on behalf of an employee, alleging a violation of the collective bargaining agreement (CBA).

tasks.description: Receive the formal grievance and log it in the labor relations case management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The labor relations specialist creates a new case for the grievance.

tasks.description: Review the specific CBA article cited in the grievance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist reviews the CBA to understand the alleged violation.

tasks.description: Schedule a grievance hearing with the union representative, the employee, and management to discuss the issue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist schedules the formal hearing as required by the CBA.
